metadata.description: Three-horizon AI/agentic potential per role. H1=Automate (rules-based), H2=AI-Assisted (human-in-loop), H3=Agentic (autonomous with oversight). efficiency_pct_2026/2027/2028 = projected cumulative % of role work addressable by AI by end of that year.
metadata.impact_pct: Estimated % of that role's work addressable by this horizon at full maturity.
metadata.efficiency_note: 2026 reflects H1 + early H2 adoption (quick wins, pilots). 2027 reflects scaled H2 + early H3. 2028 reflects full H2 + scaled H3. Year-over-year ramp reflects realistic enterprise adoption curves.
metadata.adjustment_rule: If role FTEs are 10%+ below median benchmark, multiply AI efficiency by 0.85 to reflect organization already running lean.

h1_automate.tasks: Status report generation, schedule updates, resource allocation templates, meeting-notes distribution, handoff document synthesis

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Risk identification from project data, scope-change impact analysis, auto-drafted SOWs, predictive timeline adjustments, QSG-to-athena auto-mapping

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous project health monitoring with auto-escalation, self-adjusting resource plans, proactive client comms for at-risk milestones

h1_automate.tasks: Template-based configurations from QSG data, regression test execution, data migration scripts, environment cloning, foundational build auto-generation

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: AI-generated config from requirements docs, smart field mapping QSG-to-athena, anomaly detection in migrated data, automated table-build validation

h3_agentic.tasks: Self-configuring environments from natural-language specs, autonomous test case generation and execution, auto-remediation of config drift

h1_automate.tasks: Diagram generation from templates, standard integration pattern docs, bill-of-materials creation

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Architecture option comparison from requirements, API compatibility checks, performance sizing recommendations

h3_agentic.tasks: End-to-end solution design drafts from discovery notes, autonomous technical feasibility assessments

h1_automate.tasks: LMS enrollment workflows, certificate issuance, training schedule management, feedback survey distribution

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Auto-generated EUT content from athenaOne product docs, personalized learning paths, knowledge-gap analysis from quiz data, clinical coaching content generation

h3_agentic.tasks: AI tutors that answer product questions in real-time, adaptive courseware that adjusts difficulty autonomously

h1_automate.tasks: Regression test suite execution, environment spin-up/teardown, test data generation, automated UAT checklists

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: AI-generated test cases from user stories, visual regression detection, smart test prioritization

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous exploratory testing, self-healing test scripts, continuous quality monitoring with auto-filed bugs

h1_automate.tasks: Utilization dashboards, pipeline reporting, standard org-health metrics, staffing complexity scoring

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Talent-demand forecasting, methodology effectiveness analysis, competitive intelligence summaries

h3_agentic.tasks: Limited — strategic leadership requires human judgment

h1_automate.tasks: Recurring check-in scheduling, usage report generation, renewal date alerts, standard onboarding emails

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Proactive churn-risk alerts with recommended actions, next-best-action suggestions, AI-drafted EBR decks, sentiment scoring from calls

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous low-touch account management for healthy practices, auto-triggered expansion plays, self-service health dashboards

h1_automate.tasks: Renewal quote generation, contract template population, reminder cadences, CRM pipeline updates

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Churn propensity scoring, optimal discount recommendations, competitive intel alerts, multi-year deal structuring

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous renewal execution for low-risk standard renewals, auto-negotiation within guardrails for SMB tier

h1_automate.tasks: Welcome email sequences, provisioning checklists, milestone tracking, standard kickoff deck generation

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Personalized onboarding plans based on practice profile, smart content recommendations, readiness prediction models

h3_agentic.tasks: Self-serve interactive onboarding guides that adapt in real-time, autonomous milestone verification and nudges

h1_automate.tasks: Health score calculation pipelines, scheduled report distribution, data quality checks

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Anomaly detection in usage patterns, causal analysis of churn drivers, predictive lifetime-value models

h3_agentic.tasks: Self-tuning health models, autonomous insight generation and distribution to CSMs, real-time alerting

h1_automate.tasks: Automated email campaigns, webinar registration flows, in-app messaging triggers, survey distribution

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Personalized content recommendations, segment-specific messaging, engagement scoring, optimal send-time prediction

h3_agentic.tasks: Fully autonomous digital-touch customer journey management, AI-driven 1:many relationship management

h1_automate.tasks: Territory assignment rules, quota calculations, admin tasks, standard reporting

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Capacity planning models, process bottleneck identification, tool ROI analysis

h3_agentic.tasks: Self-optimizing territory models, autonomous playbook effectiveness testing

h1_automate.tasks: Password resets, account lockouts, claims status lookups, known-issue auto-responses, ticket routing, FAQ deflection via chatbot

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Suggested resolutions from O-help KB, sentiment-based priority routing, auto-drafted responses for agent review, real-time translation

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous case resolution for known-pattern issues, AI agent handling full Tier-1 conversations, auto-escalation with context summary

h1_automate.tasks: Log collection, environment snapshot capture, standard diagnostic script execution, integration health checks

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Root-cause suggestion from log analysis, similar-case retrieval, auto-generated reproduction steps, fix recommendation ranking

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous log analysis and diagnosis for known failure modes, auto-patching for documented fixes, proactive issue detection from telemetry

h1_automate.tasks: Schedule generation, SLA breach alerts, queue rebalancing rules, standard operational reports

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Demand forecasting from ticket trends, optimal staffing models, real-time workload balancing recommendations

h3_agentic.tasks: Self-adjusting workforce schedules based on real-time demand, autonomous queue optimization

h1_automate.tasks: Article template generation, link checking, content expiry alerts, search analytics reports

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Auto-drafted articles from resolved tickets, content gap identification, SEO optimization, multi-language translation

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous KB maintenance: auto-update from product changes, auto-retire outdated O-help content, auto-generate from ticket clusters

h1_automate.tasks: Escalation notification chains, status page updates, war room scheduling, post-incident report templates

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Impact radius estimation, similar-incident retrieval, auto-drafted customer comms, root-cause pattern matching

h3_agentic.tasks: Limited — crisis management requires human judgment and executive communication

h1_automate.tasks: Random case sampling, CSAT survey distribution, standard QA scorecards, trend reporting

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: AI-powered case quality scoring, sentiment trend analysis, coaching recommendation generation, root-cause categorization

h3_agentic.tasks: Continuous autonomous QA of all interactions (not just samples), real-time coaching nudges to agents

h1_automate.tasks: Proactive monitoring alerts, scheduled health checks, automated environment audits

h2_ai_assisted.tasks: Predictive issue detection from telemetry, personalized optimization recommendations, AI-drafted account reviews

h3_agentic.tasks: Autonomous environment monitoring and self-healing for known issues, proactive outreach for detected anomalies
